derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent. (as a noun): independent usage of anti-

entry.tran: 反对者；反对分子；持反对论者
entry.def: You can refer to people who are opposed to a particular activity or idea as antis .

example.ex: Despite what the antis would tell you, hunting is for people from all walks of life.
example.tran: 不管持反对意见的人将告诉你什么，狩猎适合于各个阶层的人。

entry.def: If someone is opposed to something you can say that they are anti it.

example.ex: That's why you're so anti other people smoking.
example.tran: 那就是为什么你如此反对别人吸烟。

means.word_mean: 1. not in favor of (an action or proposal etc.)
